title: Enhanced removal of perfluorooctanoic acid by VUV/sulfite/iodide: efficiencies, influencing factors, and decomposition mechanism
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2201-2212
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00198B, Paper
Hong Liu, Ruibao Jia, Xiaodong Xin, Weilin Guo, Wei Li, Mingquan Wang, Shaohua Sun
Perfluoroalkyl acids (PFAAs) such as perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) have been referred to as “forever chemicals” and are toxic and bioaccumulative.
